resources.string: Detects when you\'re present to automatically dismiss echo notifications when you\'re using your device
Listens to new notifications and sends echo notifications according to your preferences.
The app needs access to notifications sent on this device in order to read and echo them in a nicer format. Please enable notification access in Settings.
The app won\'t work until permission to notification access is granted.
Notifications from the selected apps will be echoed
Echo notifications will only exist when the device is locked. The original notifications will not be removed.
Remove notifications when device is unlocked
Go to Settings > Notifications > App notifications, disable the apps you selected and enable this app instead.
Clear echo notifications on device unlock
Echo notifications will be automatically cleared when you unlock your device
Don\'t send notifications while device is unlocked
Echo notifications will only be sent while the device is locked

For this app to work consistently in the background, you must disable battery optimization for it. Please locate this app in the settings and select \"Don\'t optimize\". If your device allows control over app autostart, please enable that as well.
Battery optimization will make this app unreliable.
